wiki.content: The i Won't Give Up Songfacts suggests this song was inspired by Mraz's relationship with his ex-fiancee, singer-songwriter Tristan Prettyman. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The i Won't Give Up Songfacts suggests this song was inspired by Mraz's relationship with his ex-fiancee, singer-songwriter Tristan Prettyman.
